title: Introduction to BackboneJS
headline: This free online course will teach you how to build outstanding web applications using a powerful JavaScript approach.
description: One of the various libraries and frameworks you can use to create JavaScript code is Backbone.js. From beginner to expert, we will guide you step-by-step through the Backbone.js learning process. You will understand the basics and core concepts of Backbone.js and all you need to build well-structured, fully functional and styled web applications that employ the Backbone.js components and connect them to create a seamless web app.

courseDescription:
We analyze the backbone.js library and pick out the key components that make it so effective for thousands of developers. This includes working with Backbone.js' models, views, collections and routers. Backbone.js is a fantastic method for implementing JavaScript since it can be used from a limitless number of perspectives and in ways that are extremely non-opinionated. To solve JavaScript design issues, Backbone.js allows developers complete freedom and a fluid methodology. We'll explore how the libraries' parts interact with one another and fill in the blanks for nearly any web feature with ease.

This course also teaches the essential principles and functionalities of Backbone.js. You will learn how to combine the components coherently in developing your web app. Additionally, you will learn how to set up your coding environment using the Cloud9 Workspace wizard and how to build a functioning web application from scratch. You will learn the fundamentals of Backbone.js through this course so be prepared to use it in your professional job as you take your grasp of Backbone.js to new levels.

You will be able to utilize Backbone.js functionally after completing this course and you will be in a great position to learn more advanced features of the library and how to use it in conjunction with other frameworks and technologies. To begin this course, you don't need any prior Backbone.js experience. You only need a strong willingness to study, though a working grasp of HTML and JavaScript is helpful. Enroll in this course to start this interesting learning journey.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: You will learn about BackboneJS in this module, along with its foundational ideas and key terms like models, views, and Backbone.js router. You will learn how to set up the cloud 9 wizards, customize index.html, and add the Backbone.js components to your project in order to begin coding with Backbone.js.
topics: Backbone.JS Basics and Core Concepts - Learning Outcomes
Backbone.JS Basics and Core Concepts - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module will teach you more about BackboneJS's features after which you will create a user-interactive application from scratch.  You will discover how to style and debug your program to make sure it functions faultlessly. Additionally, you will be given access to additional resources to aid in the growth of your creative BackboneJS ideas.
topics: Building Applications using BackboneJS - Learning Outcomes
Building Applications using BackboneJS - Lesson Summary
